Welcome to shopping_list_manager's documentation!
=================================================

This documentation covers the shopping_list_manager module, which provides tools for creating, managing, and storing shopping lists. Here you will find detailed descriptions of the module's functionalities, including examples of how to use them effectively.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   shopping_list_functions
   modules
